attributes.action: thwart any attempt to ratify the Lison Treaty until the British electorat has had the opportunity to participate in a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, regard such a fundamental shift of the balance of power to undemocratic and unconstitutional. 
The British Government is ignoring the democratically voiced rejection of the Irish populace in ratifying said treaty. In addition, the Governmnment is betraying its oft stated promise to hold a referendum.
A decision to accept the Lisbon Treaty must be made by the British public not an unelected Prime Minister who has no mandate for making such decisions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
